notes_translated.fr: Ces tableaux présentent les principaux renseignements comptables et fiscaux, en date du 31 décembre 2018, des déclarations de revenus des sociétés qui ont fait l'objet d'une cotisation ou d'une nouvelle cotisation et dont les années d'imposition se terminent durant les années civiles 2012 à 2016. Ces tableaux seront publiés une fois l'an.
notes_translated.en: The corporate statistical tables provide key tax and accounting information as of December 31, 2018, for all T2 returns that were assessed or reassessed for corporations with tax years that end within the 2012 to 2016 calendar years. These tables are released yearly.

name: 767a00da-05e2-439e-bc16-4aa74dad3587
notes: The corporate statistical tables provide key tax and accounting information as of December 31, 2018, for all T2 returns that were assessed or reassessed for corporations with tax years that end within the 2012 to 2016 calendar years. These tables are released yearly.
title: T2 Corporate Statistics (2012 to 2016 tax years)
